results.name: Sprague-Grundy values for Dawson's Chess (octal game .137).
comment: Octal game .07 (Dawson's Kayles) has values a(n-1). Octal games .4, .401, .402, .403, .42, .421, .422 and .423 have values a(n-2).

formula: Has period 34 with the only exceptions at n=0, 14, 16, 17, 31, 34 and 51.
program: xor x y = let ((q,r), (s,t)) = (divMod x 2, divMod y 2)
in (if r == t then 0 else 1) + 2 * xor q s
mex xs = head [x | x <- [0..], not (elem x xs)]
